author: G. County

review: I have had this for one day. I hate to compare it to my roku 2 but what else can I do. The Fire Stick has a much faster response time, more space. The screen is a little confusing to navigate and it doesn't seem to have as many apps, but has all the major apps needed. The game apps are nice. There are tons of games which the roku has very little of. The fire stick has really nice free screensavers too. The remote is much cleaner and simpler to use compared to the roku. Overall I give this 4 stars and can't really say if it is better or worse than the roku.
author: Bubbie "Bubbie"

review: Very good. We have had a few roku devices over the years and decided  to give this a try.  Works great. Does have limited range being a stick.  I originally had it upstairs and across the house from the router. It worked but with some lag.  Moved it to a tv on the main floor now runs great.
